channel.title: Thoughts on Vlad Calin's personal page
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Vlad Calin's personal page

item.title: Finally I made myself a blog
item.description: There is no secret that having a blog is no big deal. Nowadays, everybody can create and host a blog with ease. So I though… why shouldn’t I have a blog? I always wanted to write about different things that bug or incite me, write a couple of words about some interesting things I do or see other people do, offer some tips about the problems that every programmer once had, etc.
